name: Secure Now Insurance Broker
description: SecureNow, a tech-enabled insurance broking firm, is bridging a vital gap by distributing pure-risk, commercial insurances to small and medium enterprises. These small companies do not have access to quality insurances on their own. SecureNow is able to distribute commercial insurances in a sustainable manner by effective use of technology. It is a full-service firm that provides excellent claims support to small companies in addition to placing quality insurances. The company’s success can be gauged by the fact that it has served over 24,000 clients and is acquiring new clients rapidly. We have been recognized as a top-three Asian Broker in 2015, 2016 & 2020 by the Asia Insurance Review, top three by TechHR for our mobile app, winner of the Claim Innovation Award 2016 & 2017, Finalist for the Fintech Innovation Award (London) in 2015, Finalist in the Economic Forum challenge in 2019 and recipient of the SKOCH Order of Merit Award 2017,2018 & 2019. Each of these awards is peer-reviewed and credible.
Headline: SecureNow is an award winning tech-enabled insurance intermediary. We provide you risk assessment & cover at best rates
ShortDescription: SecureNow, a tech-enabled insurance broking firm, is bridging a vital gap by distributing pure-risk, commercial insurances to small and medium enterprises. These small companies do not have access to quality insurances on their own.
enhanced_description: SecureNow is an award-winning, tech-enabled insurance broking firm specializing in distributing pure-risk, commercial insurances to small and medium enterprises (SMEs) that often lack access to quality insurance options. Leveraging technology for sustainable distribution, SecureNow acts as a full-service intermediary, providing essential risk assessment, competitive coverage rates, and excellent claims support, including a dedicated claims helpline and timely surveyor appointments. The firm's commitment to technology is further evidenced by its mobile app for insurance services. With over 24,000 clients served, SecureNow has received significant industry recognition, including being named a top-three Asian Broker multiple times by the Asia Insurance Review, a top-three mobile app by TechHR, and winner of the Claim Innovation Award, alongside various other accolades for fintech innovation and social impact. The product supports Total Rewards categories like Benefits Administration and Corporate Wellness, aiming to improve Employee Happiness and Engagement.
